{"compiler":{"version":"0.8.19+commit.7dd6d404"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"bytes32","name":"id","type":"bytes32"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"submitter","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint8","name":"score","type":"uint8"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"timestamp","type":"uint256"}],"name":"PredictionSubmitted","type":"event"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"id","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"getPrediction","outputs":[{"components":[{"internalType":"address","name":"submitter","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"score","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"timestamp","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"proof","type":"bytes"}],"internalType":"struct FundraisePrediction.Prediction","name":"prediction","type":"tuple"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"getTotalPredictions","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"count","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"id","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"predictionExists","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"exists","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"predictions","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"submitter","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"score","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"timestamp","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"proof","type":"bytes"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"id","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"score","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"proof","type":"bytes"}],"name":"submitPrediction","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalPredictions","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"SuperPage Team","details":"Smart contract for storing fundraising prediction results  This contract provides a simplified, gas-efficient way to store prediction results with cryptographic proofs. Each prediction is immutably recorded and can be retrieved by its unique identifier. ","events":{"PredictionSubmitted(bytes32,address,uint8,uint256)":{"details":"Event emitted when a new prediction is submitted","params":{"id":"Unique identifier for the prediction","score":"Prediction score (0-100)","submitter":"Address that submitted the prediction","timestamp":"Block timestamp"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getPrediction(bytes32)":{"details":"Get prediction data by ID","params":{"id":"Unique identifier for the prediction"},"returns":{"prediction":"The complete prediction struct  Requirements: - Prediction must exist for the given ID"}},"getTotalPredictions()":{"details":"Get the total number of predictions submitted","returns":{"count":"Total predictions count"}},"predictionExists(bytes32)":{"details":"Check if a prediction exists for the given ID","params":{"id":"Unique identifier to check"},"returns":{"exists":"True if prediction exists, false otherwise"}},"submitPrediction(bytes32,uint8,bytes)":{"details":"Submit a new prediction result","params":{"id":"Unique identifier for the prediction (e.g., keccak256 of project data)","proof":"Cryptographic proof data for verification  Requirements: - Prediction ID must not already exist - Score must be between 0 and 100 - Proof data must not be empty  Emits a {PredictionSubmitted} event.","score":"Prediction score (0-100 representing success probability percentage)"}}},"stateVariables":{"predictions":{"details":"Mapping from prediction ID to prediction data"},"totalPredictions":{"details":"Total number of predictions submitted"}},"title":"FundraisePrediction","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"This contract is designed for testnet use only (Sepolia)","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/FundraisePrediction.sol":"FundraisePrediction"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"none"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/FundraisePrediction.sol":{"keccak256":"0x967d85270fd72e9fad1b4af49ee470e780d2274def5d171975980f02a50ad599","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1af3062e25d364f0409a623f53452ea2195d38f10342302952ed9b603e01d5b1","dweb:/ipfs/QmWVgvZQjTBGLV6EJWmVwKEf828o42tWakcrqL8J9hrbmh"]}},"version":1}
